articles.title: Troy Aikman Says Calvin Ridley's Suspension 'Seems Like An Awful Lot' - TMZ
articles.description: Troy Aikman tells TMZ Sports the hammer the NFL dropped on Calvin Ridley for betting on NFL games might have been too strong.
articles.content:
Troy Aikman appears to believe the hammer the NFL dropped on Calvin Ridley for betting on NFL games was too strong ... telling TMZ Sports the one-year ban "seems like an awful lot."

articles.title: The good, the bad from James Wiseman’s return to the court - The Mercury News
articles.description: Could the 20-year-old Warriors center make an impact for Golden State after a nice debut in Santa Cruz?
articles.content:
STOCKTON  Warriors sophomore center James Wiseman was expected to be rusty in his first live game action in 11 months.
